parameters.query:
WITH datos_usuario AS (
  SELECT 
    id,
    numero_whatsapp
  FROM usuarios
  WHERE id = 'a18605bf-c5de-47fe-bf58-ca7d98a91a5d'
),
borrado AS (
  -- 1Ô∏è‚É£ Borrar logs de anuncios
  DELETE FROM logs_vistas_anuncios 
  WHERE id_usuario = (SELECT id FROM datos_usuario)
),
borrado_recordatorios AS (
  DELETE FROM recordatorios 
  WHERE id_usuario = (SELECT id FROM datos_usuario)
),
borrado_metas AS (
  DELETE FROM metas_ahorro 
  WHERE id_usuario = (SELECT id FROM datos_usuario)
),
borrado_suscripciones_usuario AS (
  DELETE FROM suscripciones_usuario 
  WHERE id_usuario = (SELECT id FROM datos_usuario)
),
borrado_suscripciones_mony AS (
  DELETE FROM suscripciones_mony 
  WHERE id_usuario = (SELECT id FROM datos_usuario)
),
borrado_transacciones AS (
  DELETE FROM transacciones 
  WHERE id_usuario = (SELECT id FROM datos_usuario)
),
borrado_categorias AS (
  DELETE FROM categorias 
  WHERE id_usuario = (SELECT id FROM datos_usuario)
),
borrado_usuario AS (
  DELETE FROM usuarios 
  WHERE id = (SELECT id FROM datos_usuario)
)
SELECT 
  true AS success,
  id,
  numero_whatsapp
FROM datos_usuario;
